sections.subtitle: Profile
sections.info: I am a Front-end developer based on the East Coast. I am passionate about providing digital solutions to real world problems. Writing semantic, maintainable code that gets the job done is what I care about.

sections.subtitle: My approach
sections.info: It is important to me that I have a complete view of the development process. Collaborating with and learning from others that share a common goal of delivering the greatest value to customers and users is the best way to connect the dots and gain a thorough understanding of the craft.
